section.name: Upgrading from 1.2 to 1.3
section.p: This section describes what needs to be done when upgrading from QDox 1.2 to QDox 1.3. For an extensive list of changes (most of them backwards compatible), please see the Changes Report.

subsection.name: Things that might break your code
subsection.p: (Thanks to Peter Donald for contributing this list).

ul.li: DocletTag is now an interface and needs to be replaced with DefaultDocletTag
JavaClass has changed so that there is no setParent but instead you need to pass the parent into the constructor.
JavaClassParent now has to additional methods that need to be implemented if you implement it: getClassLibrary() and resolveType(java.lang.String).
